hero.name: Your Name
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & UI/UX Designer
hero.description: Creating innovative digital experiences with modern technologies

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Explore my latest work and technical achievements

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.description: Technologies I work with and expertise levels

bio.paragraph1: Hello! I'm a passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience creating innovative digital solutions. I specialize in modern web technologies and have a deep love for clean, efficient code.
bio.paragraph2: My journey in development started with a curiosity about how things work under the hood. Today, I work with cutting-edge technologies like Vue.js, React, Node.js, and Python to build scalable applications that solve real-world problems.
bio.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community through writing and speaking.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Creating responsive, interactive user interfaces with modern frameworks like Vue.js and React.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Building robust server-side applications and APIs with Node.js, Python, and cloud technologies.

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Developing cross-platform mobile apps with React Native and native technologies.

devops.title: DevOps & Deployment
devops.description: Implementing CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and cloud deployment strategies.

ui-ux.title: UI/UX Design
ui-ux.description: Designing intuitive user experiences and modern interfaces with Figma and design systems.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.description: Providing technical guidance, architecture reviews, and development strategy consulting.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Ready to bring your ideas to life? Let's discuss your next project.
